algebraic.mle 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Function reference

All functions

aic()
Generic method for obtaining the AIC of an MLE fit.
algebraic.mle
algebraic.mle: A package for algebraically operating on maximum likelihood estimators.
confint(<mle>)
Function to compute the confidence intervals of mle objects.
fisher_info()
Generic method for obtaining the fisher information matrix of an mle object.
fisher_info(<mle>)
Function for obtaining the fisher information matrix of an mle object.
fisher_scoring()
Fisher scoring algorithm.
fn_distr()
Generic function for computing the distribution of f(x) where x models another distribution object.
fn_distr(<mle>)
Computes the distribution of f(x) as a function of x, where x models a mle object.
loglike()
Generic method for obtaining the log-likelihood of an MLE fit.
mle_exp()
MLE of the rate parameter of the exponential distribution given a random sample of observations drawn from it.
mle_weighted()
Accepts a list of mle objects for some parameter, say theta, and combines them into a single estimator mle_weighted
mse()
Generic function for obtaining the mean squared error (MSE) of an estimator, mse(x) = E[(x-mu)^2] where mu is the (likely unknown) true parameter value.
mse(<mle>)
Computes the MSE of an MLE
nobs()
Generic method for obtaining the number of observations used by an MLE fit.
nparams()
Generic method for obtaining the number of parameters of an MLE fit.
point()
Generic method for obtaining the best point estimate from an estimator.
point(<mle>)
Computes the point estimate of an mle object.
sampler()
Generic function for sampling from distribution objects.
sampler(<mle>)
Method for sampling from an mle object.
sampler(<mle_exp>)
Method for sampling from an mle_exp object.

Developed by Alexander Towell.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
